name: Semiconductor Scoring
description: Scoring template for Semiconductor super-sector patents. Includes manufacturing relevance and chip integration metrics.

questions.question: How relevant is this to semiconductor manufacturing processes? Consider lithography, etching, deposition, packaging, and process nodes.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify manufacturing processes and node relevance.

questions.question: How easily can this be integrated into chip designs? Consider area, power, design complexity, and IP licensing potential.
How broadly applicable is this patent across different process nodes and technology generations?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify applicable process nodes and technology generations.
